description_parent: Requires 2 different devices and internet connection. Requires user login. Tasks, rewards and points awarded to the child are checked here.
description_child: Requires 2 different devices and internet connection. Requires user login. Tasks and rewards given by the parent are completed here.
description_guest: Only one device is enough. No internet connection required. No user login required. All controls are done from a single device. If you delete the app, all your data will be irreversibly deleted. No user login required.
